synopsis.text: After a brave act of saving a monkey and its child from a merciless hunter, a soldier is gifted a magical sword, known as 'The Monkey Masamune', in gratitude. Armed with this new weapon, the soldier embarks on a long and arduous journey through breathtaking landscapes of mountains and hills, all to deliver a letter of great importance. Along the way, he finds himself in various unexpected situations, yet he remains undeterred, taking moments to rest and appreciate the beauty around him. This 1930 short film weaves a tale of courage, kindness, and determination, as our soldier navigates the challenges of his journey with the help of his enchanted sword.
